Biden Labor Department moves to expand overtime pay for millions  —  Workers making less than about $55,000 annually would be automatically entitled to time-and-a-half pay under DOL's proposal.  —  The Biden administration on Wednesday proposed giving raises to more than 3 million workers by making them eligible for overtime pay.
